headline: American Water Works : Pennsylvania American Water Completes Roaring Brook Dredging
summary: SCRANTON, Pa. - Pennsylvania American Water has completed the dredging of Roaring Brook in response to an accidental release of silt and sediment into the waterway earlier this year. This effort is...
